hero.tagline: Turning ideas into production-ready code with TypeScript and React. I enjoy leading features, architecting solutions, and building alongside great teams.

bio.p1: I'm a Lead Full Stack Developer with over 7 years of experience building web applications. I specialize in TypeScript and React, focusing on clean architecture, comprehensive test coverage, and leading features from concept to delivery.
bio.p2: My journey started in the Estonian startup ecosystem, where I co-founded Studery and won multiple entrepreneurship competitions. This experience shaped my approach to taking ownership and driving initiatives forward.
bio.p3: I'm drawn to environments where I can take ownership, collaborate with strong teams, and continuously improve both the product and myself. Quality and craftsmanship matter to me.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern glassmorphism portfolio built with React, TypeScript, and Framer Motion. Features smooth animations and responsive design.

lottolens.title: LottoLens
lottolens.description: Statistical analysis tool for lottery numbers with probability calculations, historical data visualization, and smart number suggestions.

obsidianos.title: ObsidianOS
obsidianos.description: Led frontend development for a modern operating system interface. Built from ground zero with React, comprehensive test coverage, and close design collaboration.

katanaFeatures.title: Katana MRP Features
katanaFeatures.description: Epic leading for major manufacturing features including inventory management, production planning, and real-time analytics.

obsidianos.description: Leading frontend development from ground zero. Close collaboration with backend and design teams. Built with React, Zustand, TanStack Query, and comprehensive test coverage.

katana.description: Epic leading for major features. Architecture planning, developer onboarding, and code review leadership. Worked with PostgreSQL, Node.js, and React.

netgroup.description: Full stack development with Java Spring, PostgreSQL, and React. SCRUM facilitation and comprehensive testing with JUnit5 and Jest.

travelwiser.description: Frontend development with React, Redux, and Bootstrap. Building travel-related web applications.

ibkrates.description: Trainee position working with Java and GWT framework. Learning enterprise development practices.

itcollege.description: Led the Student Union during the ITC-TalTech merger. Handled complex organizational challenges and stakeholder negotiations.

ribs.description: Mentored young entrepreneurs from Estonia, Finland, and Sweden. Training in business ideation and entrepreneurship.

sak.description: Organized Saaremaa Päike entrepreneurship program. Mentored youngsters in idea generation and business development.

studery.description: Co-founded an interactive studybook platform for schools on Android. Born from winning the Entrum entrepreneurship program.

nycpianobar.description: Self-taught cooking skills from zero to head chef in 3 weeks. Full kitchen responsibility including ordering, planning, and daily specials.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Hi Mihkel, I'd like to discuss...

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Feel free to reach out! I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

chat.title: Ask about Mihkel
chat.greeting: Hey there! I'm Mihkel's AI sidekick and I know quite a lot about him.
chat.hint: Go ahead – ask about his tech stack, projects, or how he went from zero to head chef in 3 weeks!
